solutions.title: Certified Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Professionally certified drone core kits providing complete solutions for different application scenarios
solutions.creator: Creator

footer.description: Connecting global drone creators with professional clients, providing professional verification, production, and sales of excellent drone innovation designs, offering creators 50% profit sharing.

valueFlow.title: Value Flow Process
valueFlow.subtitle: From creator submission to customer receiving certified products, we have established a complete value flow system

step1.title: Creator Submission
step1.description: Drone creators submit verified design solutions including technical documentation, test reports, and BOM lists.

step2.title: Professional Review & Certification
step2.description: Our technical team conducts professional review of solutions to ensure technical feasibility and market value.

step3.title: Supply Chain Production
step3.description: Collaborate with global top-tier supply chain partners for small-batch trial production and performance verification.

step4.title: Platform Sales & Revenue Sharing
step4.description: Through platform sales, creators receive 50% profit sharing while customers get certified products.

transparency.title: Transparent Operations
transparency.subtitle: We believe transparent operations are the foundation of trust, making every process open and transparent

certification.title: Open & Transparent Certification Process
certification.description: All certification standards, testing processes, and review results are completely public, ensuring fairness and justice.

costBreakdown.title: Detailed Cost Breakdown
costBreakdown.description: The cost structure and profit distribution of each solution are clearly visible, giving creators and customers peace of mind.

progressTracking.title: Real-time Progress Tracking
progressTracking.description: From submission to certification, from production to delivery, the progress of each stage can be viewed in real-time.

communityOversight.title: Community Oversight Mechanism
communityOversight.description: Establish a community oversight mechanism that allows all participants to participate in quality supervision.

partners.title: Ecosystem Partners
partners.subtitle: Deep collaboration with global top-tier technology companies and supply chain partners to provide the highest quality services for creators and customers

huawei.name: Huawei Cloud
huawei.description: Cloud computing and AI technology support

caseStudies.title: Success Cases
caseStudies.subtitle: See how our creators achieve business success through the platform
caseStudies.creator: Creator

case1.title: Mr. Wang's FPV Verification Kit Success Case
case1.description: From personal hobby to business success, Mr. Wang's FPV verification kit achieved great success on the platform with monthly sales exceeding 100 units.
case1.creator: Mr. Wang

case2.title: Mr. Li's Security Inspection Kit
case2.description: Designed specifically for the security industry, the inspection kit has gained recognition and procurement from multiple security companies.
case2.creator: Mr. Li

case3.title: Mr. Zhang's Agricultural Plant Protection Kit
case3.description: Professional kit designed for agricultural plant protection needs, helping farmers improve plant protection efficiency and reduce costs.
case3.creator: Mr. Zhang
